description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to support the watershed development component of PMKSY through technical assistance to improve incremental conservation outcomes and agricultural yields for communities in selected sites, and adoption of more effective processes and technologies in participating states.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :IUFR | Description :Participating States and State Level Nodal Agencies to prepare and furnish to theAssociation not later than forty-five (45) days after the end of each calendar quarter, quarterly interim unaudited financialreports for the Project, satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :National Institute of Hydrology | Description :National Institute of Hydrology shall be an implementing agencyto support the implementation of the activities required under Part2(c) of the Financial Agreement of the Project in a mannersatisfactory to the Bank | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Reports | Description :Prepare Project Reports covering the period of one calendar semester and furnishto the Association not later than one (1) month after the end of the period covered by such report. | Frequency :Quarterly
